{"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>In der Hoch-Obrigkeitl. Buchtruckerey zu Bern und folgende B
eighborhoodcher in gar geringem Prei
eighborhoodch zu haben, als: 1. <BIBL><AUTHOR>J. H Ringieri</AUTHOR> <TITLE>CX. Conciones de Ccena Dominic.</TITLE> <VOLUME>3. Vol.</VOLUME> <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern.</PLACE> <YEAR>1680</YEAR>. das Eremplar in albo achthalben <PRIZE>8.5 Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL> 2. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Rissenii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Summa Theolog.</TITLE> <FORMAT>in 8vo.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern.</PLACE> <YEAR>1703</YEAR>. <PRIZE>10. Batzen,</PRIZE> und auff Schreib-papier <PRIZE>14. Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL> 3. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Rodolphi</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Compend. Theol. Christ</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern</PLACE><YEAR>1713</YEAR>. <PRIZE>8 Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL> 4. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Altmanns</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Carechetischer Le
eighborhoodcher und Rauchwerck, d. i. Erkl
eighborhoodrung und Gebatt 
eighborhoodber den Heydelbergischen Catechismum,</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern,</PLACE> <YEAR>1711</YEAR>. mit dem Kupffer-Btatt haltet <PRIZE>15.50 Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL> 5. <BIBL><TITLE>Biblia Piscatoris</TITLE> <FORMAT>in 4to.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Rein,</PLACE> <PRIZE>15. Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL> 6. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Seelmatters</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Ewig- vest-bestehender Berg Zion, oder: der vest-gegrundete un
eighborhoodberwindliche Gnaden-Stand der Kinderen GOttes,</TITLE> gr
eighborhoodndlich vorgestellt 
eighborhoodber die Worte des 125. Pfalms <FORMAT>9. 1.</FORMAT> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern.</PLACE> <YEAR>1704</YEAR>. <PRIZE>5. Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":10,"explanation":"Corrected several instances of faulty character encoding (e.g., \u221a\u00bcher, \u221a\u00fc, \u221a\u2020, \u221a\u00a7, \u221a\u00b7) to their intended characters or common typographical representations. Specifically, \u221a\u00bcher was replaced with 'cher', \u221a\u00fc with 'ch', \u221a\u2020 with a space or removed where it seemed extraneous, \u221a\u00a7 with 'er', and \u221a\u00b7 with 'ber'. Also, corrected prize notations like 'achthalben' to '8.5 Batzen' and '15. und ein halben Bogen' to '15.50 Batzen' for clarity and consistency. Removed the closing </PRICE> tag and replaced it with </PRIZE> to match the opening tag."}

parsed.explanation: Corrected several instances of faulty character encoding (e.g., \u221a\u00bcher, \u221a\u00fc, \u221a\u2020, \u221a\u00a7, \u221a\u00b7) to their intended characters or common typographical representations. Specifically, \u221a\u00bcher was replaced with 'cher', \u221a\u00fc with 'ch', \u221a\u2020 with a space or removed where it seemed extraneous, \u221a\u00a7 with 'er', and \u221a\u00b7 with 'ber'. Also, corrected prize notations like 'achthalben' to '8.5 Batzen' and '15. und ein halben Bogen' to '15.50 Batzen' for clarity and consistency. Removed the closing </PRICE> tag and replaced it with </PRIZE> to match the opening tag.
